    37→### 2.2 Main Application
    38→
    39→**File**: `src/adw/tui/app.py`
    40→
    41→```python
    42→"""Main ADW TUI application."""
    43→
    44→from __future__ import annotations
    45→
    46→from textual.app import App, ComposeResult
    47→from textual.binding import Binding
    48→from textual.containers import Container, Horizontal, Vertical
    49→from textual.widgets import Header, Footer, Static, Placeholder
    50→
    51→from .widgets.status_bar import StatusBar
    52→
    53→
    54→class ADWApp(App):
    55→    """ADW Dashboard Application."""
    56→
    57→    CSS_PATH = "styles.tcss"
    58→    TITLE = "ADW"
    59→    SUB_TITLE = "AI Developer Workflow"
    60→
    61→    BINDINGS = [
    62→        Binding("n", "new_task", "New"),
    63→        Binding("q", "quit", "Quit"),
    64→        Binding("?", "show_help", "Help"),
    65→        Binding("tab", "focus_next", "Next"),
    66→        Binding("shift+tab", "focus_previous", "Prev"),
    67→        Binding("escape", "cancel", "Cancel"),
    68→    ]
    69→
    70→    def compose(self) -> ComposeResult:
    71→        """Create the UI layout."""
    72→        yield Header()
    73→
    74→        with Container(id="app-container"):
    75→            with Horizontal(id="main-panels"):
    76→                # Left: Task list
    77→                with Vertical(id="left-panel", classes="panel"):
    78→                    yield Static("TASKS", classes="panel-title")
    79→                    yield Placeholder("Task List", id="task-list-placeholder")
    80→
    81→                # Right: Task detail
    82→                with Vertical(id="right-panel", classes="panel"):
    83→                    yield Static("DETAILS", classes="panel-title")
    84→                    yield Placeholder("Task Details", id="task-detail-placeholder")
    85→
    86→            # Bottom: Logs
    87→            with Vertical(id="bottom-panel", classes="panel"):
    88→                yield Static("LOGS", classes="panel-title")
    89→                yield Placeholder("Log Viewer", id="log-placeholder")
    90→
    91→            # Status/input bar
    92→            yield StatusBar(id="status-bar")
    93→
    94→        yield Footer()
    95→
    96→    def action_new_task(self) -> None:
    97→        """Handle new task action."""
    98→        self.notify("New task (not implemented yet)")
    99→
   100→    def action_show_help(self) -> None:
   101→        """Show help."""
   102→        self.notify("Help: n=new, q=quit, tab=switch panels")
   103→
   104→    def action_cancel(self) -> None:
   105→        """Cancel current action."""
   106→        pass
   107→
   108→    async def action_quit(self) -> None:
   109→        """Quit the application."""
   110→        self.exit()
   111→
   112→
   113→def run_tui() -> None:
   114→    """Run the TUI application."""
   115→    app = ADWApp()
   116→    app.run()
   117→```

   119→### 2.3 Stylesheet
   120→
   121→**File**: `src/adw/tui/styles.tcss`
   122→
   123→```css
   124→/* ADW TUI Stylesheet */
   125→
   126→/* Base */
   127→Screen {
   128→    background: $surface;
   129→}
   130→
   131→/* Header */
   132→Header {
   133→    dock: top;
   134→    height: 1;
   135→    background: $primary;
   136→}
   137→
   138→/* Footer */
   139→Footer {
   140→    dock: bottom;
   141→    height: 1;
   142→    background: $primary;
   143→}
   144→
   145→/* Main container */
   146→#app-container {
   147→    width: 100%;
   148→    height: 100%;
   149→    padding: 0;
   150→}
   151→
   152→/* Main panels horizontal layout */
   153→#main-panels {
   154→    height: 60%;
   155→    width: 100%;
   156→}
   157→
   158→/* Left panel - task list */
   159→#left-panel {
   160→    width: 35%;
   161→    height: 100%;
   162→    border: solid $primary;
   163→    border-title-color: $primary;
   164→}
   165→
   166→/* Right panel - task details */
   167→#right-panel {
   168→    width: 65%;
   169→    height: 100%;
   170→    border: solid $primary;
   171→    border-title-color: $primary;
   172→}
   173→
   174→/* Bottom panel - logs */
   175→#bottom-panel {
   176→    height: 35%;
   177→    width: 100%;
   178→    border: solid $primary;
   179→    border-title-color: $primary;
   180→}
   181→
   182→/* Panel styling */
   183→.panel {
   184→    padding: 0 1;
   185→}
   186→
   187→.panel-title {
   188→    text-style: bold;
   189→    color: $primary;
   190→    padding: 0 0 1 0;
   191→    text-align: center;
   192→}
   193→
   194→/* Status bar */
   195→#status-bar {
   196→    dock: bottom;
   197→    height: 3;
   198→    width: 100%;
   199→    border: solid $secondary;
   200→    padding: 0 1;
   201→}
   202→
   203→/* Placeholders */
   204→Placeholder {
   205→    height: 100%;
   206→}
   207→
   208→/* Focus states */
   209→.panel:focus-within {
   210→    border: solid $accent;
   211→}
   212→
   213→/* Responsive - small terminals */
   214→@media (max-width: 80) {
   215→    #main-panels {
   216→        height: 50%;
   217→    }
   218→    #left-panel {
   219→        width: 100%;
   220→        height: 50%;
   221→    }
   222→    #right-panel {
   223→        display: none;
   224→    }
   225→}

   228→### 2.4 Status Bar Widget
   229→
   230→**File**: `src/adw/tui/widgets/status_bar.py`
   231→
   232→```python
   233→"""Status bar widget with input capability."""
   234→
   235→from __future__ import annotations
   236→
   237→from textual.widgets import Static, Input
   238→from textual.containers import Horizontal
   239→from textual.app import ComposeResult
   240→
   241→
   242→class StatusBar(Static):
   243→    """Status bar with message display and input."""
   244→
   245→    DEFAULT_CSS = """
   246→    StatusBar {
   247→        height: 3;
   248→        layout: horizontal;
   249→    }
   250→
   251→    StatusBar > .status-info {
   252→        width: 30%;
   253→        padding: 1;
   254→    }
   255→
   256→    StatusBar > .status-input {
   257→        width: 70%;
   258→        padding: 0 1;
   259→    }
   260→
   261→    StatusBar Input {
   262→        width: 100%;
   263→    }
   264→    """
   265→
   266→    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
   267→        super().__init__(*args, **kwargs)
   268→        self.active_tasks = 0
   269→        self.selected_task = None
   270→
   271→    def compose(self) -> ComposeResult:
   272→        """Create status bar content."""
   273→        with Horizontal():
   274→            yield Static(self._get_status_text(), id="status-info", classes="status-info")
   275→            with Static(classes="status-input"):
   276→                yield Input(placeholder="Type message or command...", id="status-input-field")
   277→
   278→    def _get_status_text(self) -> str:
   279→        """Get status display text."""
   280→        if self.selected_task:
   281→            return f"Selected: {self.selected_task}"
   282→        return f"Tasks: {self.active_tasks} active"
   283→
   284→    def update_status(self, active_tasks: int = 0, selected_task: str | None = None):
   285→        """Update the status display."""
   286→        self.active_tasks = active_tasks
   287→        self.selected_task = selected_task
   288→
   289→        info = self.query_one("#status-info", Static)
   290→        info.update(self._get_status_text())
   291→```
